body: Iran's "Cyber Army" hacked Voice of America's website today and left a message for Hilary Clinton: "Mrs. Clinton, Do you want to hear the voice of the oppressed nations? The Islamic nations would no more be tricked by the US, and we want you to stop interfering in the Islamic countries."
original_body: Iran's "Cyber Army" hacked Voice of America's website today and left a message for Hilary Clinton: "Mrs. Clinton, Do you want to hear the voice of the oppressed nations? The Islamic nations would no more be tricked by the US, and we want you to stop interfering in the Islamic countries."
title: Iran: VOA Hacked by "Cyber Army"
